name: Crowded Street
description:
> JUST DON'T CRASH

Crowded street is a game where you have to avoid casualties at all price. While the car is out of your control, you are able to control your surrounding by reversing its movement. 

> HOW TO PLAY

To reverse the movement of objects, just click at them.

> CREDITS

Code: mawal 
Art: Riodsh

Made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 - REWIND
